itunes:title: Episode 088: Andrea & Andreas von Strucker (feat. Spencer Ackerman)
title: Episode 088: Andrea & Andreas von Strucker (feat. Spencer Ackerman)
itunes:author: Connor Goldsmith
description:
In Episode 88 of CEREBRO, Connor and returning guest Spencer Ackerman (Reign of Terror, Waller vs. Wildstorm) combine their powers to roast Andrea and Andreas von Strucker, the foul Fenris! Created by Chris Claremont and John Romita, Jr., the remarkably evil Fenris twins are Nazi siblings who fuck each other. This one's dark!

The CEREBRO character file on Fenris begins at 1:13:38.

(Content Advisory: Andrea and Andreas are despicable, incestuous, violent racists. Do you have something you need to be warned about? It is probably discussed in this episode. Please be warned. Love you!)

You can support CEREBRO on Patreon!

Grateful to SkillShare for sponsoring the podcast this month. Visit skillshare.com/CEREBRO today to get your first month FREE! 



Advertising Inquiries: https://redcircle.com/brands
